alldb.table_sql: select tttt.* from( SELECT T_DICTS_DATAS.CODE_ AS CODE, T_DICTS_DATAS.ID_ AS VALUE, CASE '{TENWA_ISENGLISH}' WHEN 'en_US' THEN T_DICTS_DATAS.EN_NAME_ ELSE T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ END AS {displayname}NAME, --T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ AS {displayname}NAME, --T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ AS NAME, T_DICTS_DATAS.PID_ AS PID, T_DICTS_DATAS.POSITION_ FROM T_DICTS_DATAS LEFT JOIN T_DICTS ON T_DICTS_DATAS.PID_=T_DICTS.ID_ WHERE T_DICTS_DATAS.ENABLED_ = 1 /~pid: AND T_DICTS.CODE_ ='{pid}'~/ /~notid: AND T_DICTS_DATAS.CODE_ NOT IN('{notid}')~/ /~name: AND T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ like '%{name}%'~/ /~searchtext: AND T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ LIKE '{searchtext}%'~/ )TTTT <EXTRACTEND>order by POSITION_ <EXTRACTEND>

sqlserver.table_sql: select tttt.* from( SELECT T_DICTS_DATAS.CODE_ AS CODE, T_DICTS_DATAS.ID_ AS VALUE, --[dbo].[FN_getLanguage]('{_TENWA_USERID}') CASE '{TENWA_ISENGLISH}' WHEN 'en_US' THEN T_DICTS_DATAS.EN_NAME_ ELSE T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ END AS {displayname}NAME, --T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ AS {displayname}NAME, --T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ AS NAME, T_DICTS_DATAS.PID_ AS PID, T_DICTS_DATAS.POSITION_ FROM T_DICTS_DATAS LEFT JOIN T_DICTS ON T_DICTS_DATAS.PID_=T_DICTS.ID_ WHERE T_DICTS_DATAS.ENABLED_ = 1 /~pid: AND T_DICTS.CODE_ ='{pid}'~/ /~notid: AND T_DICTS_DATAS.CODE_ NOT IN('{notid}')~/ /~name: AND T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ like '%{name}%'~/ /~searchtext: AND T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ LIKE '{searchtext}%'~/ )TTTT <EXTRACTEND>order by POSITION_ <EXTRACTEND>

mysql.table_sql: select tttt.* from( SELECT T_DICTS_DATAS.CODE_ AS CODE, T_DICTS_DATAS.ID_ AS VALUE, CASE '{TENWA_ISENGLISH}' WHEN 'en_US' THEN T_DICTS_DATAS.EN_NAME_ ELSE T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ END AS {displayname}NAME, T_DICTS_DATAS.PID_ AS PID, T_DICTS_DATAS.POSITION_ FROM T_DICTS_DATAS LEFT JOIN T_DICTS ON T_DICTS_DATAS.PID_=T_DICTS.ID_ WHERE (T_DICTS_DATAS.ENABLED_ IN ('Y','y',1)) /~pid: AND T_DICTS.CODE_ ='{pid}'~/ /~notid: AND T_DICTS_DATAS.CODE_ NOT IN('{notid}')~/ /~name: AND T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ like '%{name}%'~/ /~searchtext: AND T_DICTS_DATAS.NAME_ LIKE '{searchtext}%'~/ )TTTT <EXTRACTEND>order by POSITION_ <EXTRACTEND>
